landing.hero.badge: The easiest way to grow your salon online
landing.hero.subheadline: Attract more clients with a professional website designed specifically for nail salons. No upfront costs â€” just a simple monthly subscription.
landing.features.subheadline: Our websites are designed specifically for nail salons with all the features you need to grow your business.
landing.features.item1.title: Responsive Design
landing.features.item1.description: Our websites look great on all devices - from mobile phones to large desktop screens.
landing.features.item2.title: Service Showcase
landing.features.item2.description: Beautifully display your services with prices to attract more clients.
landing.features.item3.title: Online Booking
landing.features.item3.description: Allow clients to book appointments online and manage your schedule easily.
landing.features.item4.title: Fast Performance
landing.features.item4.description: Lightning-fast websites that load quickly and keep clients engaged.
landing.features.item5.title: SEO Optimized
landing.features.item5.description: Get found by potential clients through search engines with our SEO-friendly designs.
landing.features.item6.title: Easy Management
landing.features.item6.description: Simple tools to update your content without any technical knowledge needed.
